mapper.prompt:
- Use `{{1.sender.id}}` to track and distinguish between different users.  

- Maintain a separate information set for each unique `sender.id`.  
- Collect the full name of the user. 
- Collect the name of the company or organization.     
- Collect a valid phone number.  
- Collect a valid email address.  

- If all four pieces of information are available, go to Route 2 and Make API CALL 

- If any information is missing, go to Route 1 and wait for more messages.  

- Don't use example value to assign varibales.

- if you don't get username or comapny name make on your own but don't make mobile number and email on your own

Example messeages from where to collect the info:

Example 1:
Gadget bhai
01948182068
sarkarriad63@gmail.com

Example 2:
nahian@placidbd.com 
+8801770768023  
Company: PLACID Type: 
Indenting Location: Uttara

User can reply in bangla so you have to handle that also. Take as much time you want to analyze message.

parameters.name: phone_number
parameters.description: phone number of the user mainly bangldeshi phone number

parameters.name: organization_name
parameters.description: name of the organization the user belongs to
